remixlab.fpstiming

Interface Timer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeqTimer

    public interface Timer
    Interface defining timers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Stops the timer.
      void create()
      Creates the timer.
      boolean isActive()
      Tells whether or not the timer is active.
      boolean isSingleShot()
      Returns whether or not the timer is scheduled to be executed only once.
      long period()
      Returns the timer period in milliseconds.
      void run()
      Runs the timer according to period().
      void run(long period)
      Calls setPeriod(long) followed by run().
      void setPeriod(long period)
      Defines the timer period in milliseconds.
      void setSingleShot(boolean singleShot)
      Defines the timer as a single shot or for repeated execution.
      void stop()
      Stops the timer.
      Taskable timingTask()
      Returns the object defining the timer callback method.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(long period)
        Calls setPeriod(long) followed by run().
        Parameters:
        period - time in milliseconds between successive task executions

      • run

        void run()
        Runs the timer according to period(). The timer may be scheduled for repeated fixed-rate execution according to isSingleShot().

      • timingTask

        Taskable timingTask()
        Returns the object defining the timer callback method. May be null.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the timer.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Stops the timer.

      • create

        void create()
        Creates the timer.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Tells whether or not the timer is active.

      • period

        long period()
        Returns the timer period in milliseconds.

      • setPeriod

        void setPeriod(long period)
        Defines the timer period in milliseconds.

      • isSingleShot

        boolean isSingleShot()
        Returns whether or not the timer is scheduled to be executed only once.

      • setSingleShot

        void setSingleShot(boolean singleShot)
        Defines the timer as a single shot or for repeated execution.
